description: This file defines a set of React components for an alert dialog UI, utilizing the @radix-ui/react-alert-dialog primitive components and wrapping them for styling and composition. It includes overlay, content, header, footer, title, description, action, and cancel button components, designed for use in React applications with custom styling.

classes.name: AlertDialogOverlay
classes.description: A styled overlay component for the alert dialog, using Radix UI primitive for overlay behavior with custom styling.

classes.name: AlertDialogContent
classes.description: A composite component that renders the main dialog content, including overlay and animated transition effects.

classes.name: AlertDialogHeader
classes.description: A container component for the alert dialog header, providing layout and styling.

classes.name: AlertDialogFooter
classes.description: A container component for the alert dialog footer, typically housing action buttons.

classes.name: AlertDialogTitle
classes.description: A component for the dialog's title, using Radix primitive Title component with styling.

classes.name: AlertDialogDescription
classes.description: A component for the dialog description text, using Radix primitive Description component with styling.

classes.name: AlertDialogAction
classes.description: A button component for primary dialog actions, styled with buttonVariants.

classes.name: AlertDialogCancel
classes.description: A button component to cancel or close the dialog, styled with outline variant.

methods.name: React.forwardRef
methods.description: React utility to forward refs to DOM components.

methods.name: cn
methods.description: Utility function for conditionally joining class names.

methods.name: buttonVariants
methods.description: Function returning styling variants for button components.
